accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Closed until 2026. Access before then requires written permission from the Office of the Legal Advisor.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence of the Secretary of the Board of Visitors, Accession #RG-1/2/2.772, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection is an archival transfer of the Board of Visitors, 1977 August 3.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning personnel actions including letters of appointment, re-appointment, promotions, title changes, special salary actions, and resignations for the University and Clinch Valley College.

arrangement.head: Organization/Arrangement
arrangement.p: Box 1: Personnel actions, Clinch Valley College, elections, re-elections, promotions, leave of absences, resignations, appointments 1972-1974, Personnel actions, appointments and re-appointments 1975 October 3- 1976 May 28, Personnel actions changes of title 1975 Oct 3-1976 May 28, Personnel actions, elections 1975 Oct 3, Personnel actions elections 1976 Jan 23, Personnel actions elections 1976 Mar 26, Personnel actions elections 1976 May 28, Personnel actions leaves of absences 1976 May 28.

Box 2: Personnel actions, promotions 1975-1976, Personnel actions re-elections 1975-Oct 3, 1976 Jan 23, Personnel actions, re-elections change of re-election re-appointments 1976 Mar 26, May 28, Personnel actions resignations 1975-1976, Personnel actions special salary actions 1975 Oct 3.
